channel.description: Recent content in Add on Mryqu's Notes

item.title: 使用Vagrant Box
item.description: //Download a box to local disk $ vagrant box add my-box /path/to/the/new.box ... $ vagrant init my-box ... $ vagrant up ...

item.title: [Git] Create patch with untracked files
item.description: 前一博文Create patch with untracked files using Git format-patch/diff/stash中的方案比较绕，今天有了一个更好一点的法子: git add . git diff --cached > yqu.patch git reset origin/master
